sentence.Network_en: A simple pair of mild diarrhea alone could eat Apple antidiarrheal.
sentence.Network_cn: 对单纯性的轻度腹泻,单吃苹果可止泻.

sentence.Network_en: Apple Apple can antidiarrheal, can purge.
sentence.Network_cn: 苹果苹果既能止泻, 又能通便.

sentence.Network_en: For diarrhea, physicians may prescribe antidiarrheal medication, antibiotics, intravenous fluids or changes in diet.
sentence.Network_cn: 对腹泻医生可能会开止泻药 、 抗生素 、 静脉补液或调整饮食.
